## PickPrefixedArray type

Constructs a tuple type by picking the sets of properties with the prefixes specified by `TPrefixes` (a tuple of string literals) from `TProps`<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type PickPrefixedArray<TProps, TPrefixes> = TPrefixes extends [
    infer TFirst,
    ...infer TRest
] ? [
    PickPrefixed<TProps, TFirst>,
    ...PickPrefixedArray<OmitPrefixed<TProps, TFirst>, TRest>
] : [];
```
**References:** [PickPrefixed](./use-prefixed-props.pickprefixed.md)<!-- -->, [PickPrefixedArray](./use-prefixed-props.pickprefixedarray.md)<!-- -->, [OmitPrefixed](./use-prefixed-props.omitprefixed.md)

## Example


```ts
 type Props = { foo: unknown, "foo-bar": unknown, "bar-baz": unknown }

 type FooBarProps = PickPrefixedArray<Props, ["foo", "bar"]>
 // [ { bar: unknown }, { baz: unknown } ]
```
